Novak), Andy (Ed Helms) and the rest of the Scranton crew ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $59.98 - $40.69
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:44:18 UTC – Details)


The Office is a hilarious mockumentary-style glimpse into the water-cooler culture of the 9-to-5 world. Join obnoxious regional manager Michael Scott (Steve Carell) and his fellow paper pushers Dwight (Rainn Wilson), Jim (John Krasinski), Pam (Jenna Fischer), Ryan (B.J. Novak), Andy (Ed Helms) and the rest of the Scranton crew as they steal customers, frame co-workers, indulge in intra-office love affairs and just plain behave badly while a documentary crew captures their every word and misdeed. Developed by Primetime Emmy® Award winner Greg Daniels, The Office Seasons 6 thorugh 9 include 101 episodes on 20 discs, plus bonus commentaries, webisodes, blooper reels and deleted scenes!
Bonus Content:
Disc 1 – The Office: Season Six:

  • Deleted Scenes
  • “Niagara” Commentary with Greg Daniels and Paul Feig
  • “Niagara” Commentary with Randy Cordray, Kelly Cantley, Michael Gallenberg, Claire Scanlon, Veda Semarne and Mary Wall

Disc 2 – The Office: Season Six:

  • Deleted Scenes
  • “Murder” Commentary with Greg Daniels, Ellie Kemper and Daniel Chun

Disc 3 – The Office: Season Six:

  • Deleted Scenes
  • Welcome to Sabre
  • “Secret Santa” Commentary with Mindy Kaling, Ellie Kemper and Claire Scanlon
  • “The Delivery” Commentary with Greg Daniels, Jenna Fischer, Seth Gordon, Daniel Chun and Charlie Grandy

Disc 4 – The Office: Season Six:

  • Deleted Scenes
  • “Happy Hour” Commentary with B.J. Novak, Angela Kinsey, Oscar Nunez, Brian Baumgartner and Matt Sohn

Disc 5 – The Office: Season Six:

  • Deleted Scenes
  • Blooper Reel
  • Original Digital Short: The Podcast
  • The Office Promos – Canada Games
  • Parks and Recreation Episode: “Hunting Trip”

Disc 6 – The Office: Season Seven:

  • Deleted Scenes
  • “Nepotism” Commentary with B.J. Novak, Craig Robinson, Creed Bratton, Charlie Grandy, and David Rogers

Disc 7 – The Office: Season Seven:

  • Deleted Scenes

Disc 8 – The Office: Season Seven:

  • Deleted Scenes
  • Threat Level Midnight: The Movie (A Michael Scott Joint)
  • “PDA” Commentary with Greg Daniels, Ellie Kemper, Angela Kinsey, Brian Baumgartner, Claire Scanlon, Kelly Cantley and Robert Padnick
  • “Threat Level Midnight” Commentary with Paul Lieberstein, B.J. Novak, Creed Bratton, Craig Robinson, and Daniel Chun

Disc 9 – The Office: Season Seven:

  • Deleted Scenes
  • “Goodbye Michael” Commentary with Greg Daniels, Ellie Kemper, Angela Kinsey, Brian Baumgartner, and David Rogers

Disc 10 – The Office: Season Seven:

  • Deleted Scenes
  • Blooper Reel
  • Webisodes: The 3rd Floor
  • “Dwight K. Schrute, (Acting) Manager” Commentary with Mindy Kaling, Ellie Kemper, Angela Kinsey, Steve Hely and Justin Spitzer

Disc 11 – The Office: Season Eight:

  • Deleted Scenes

Disc 12 – The Office: Season Eight:

  • Deleted Scenes

Disc 13 – The Office: Season Eight:

  • Deleted Scenes

Disc 14 – The Office: Season Eight:

  • Deleted Scenes

Disc 15 – The Office: Season Eight:

  • Deleted Scenes
  • Blooper Reel

Disc 20 – The Office: Season Nine:

  • 2003 Casting

item.title: The Office: Season Eight [DVD]
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Big changes are in store for Scranton in the hilarious eighth season of this Primetime Emmy® Award-winning series. Andy takes over as manager of Dunder Mifflin and finds the job to be more than he bargained for. He wants to win the respect of his employees, while going toe-to-toe with ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.98 - $13.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:17:39 UTC – Details)


Big changes are in store for Scranton in the hilarious eighth season of this Primetime Emmy® Award-winning series. Andy takes over as manager of Dunder Mifflin and finds the job to be more than he bargained for. He wants to win the respect of his employees, while going toe-to-toe with Robert California (James Spader, Boston Legal), the enigmatic new CEO, who wants to turn the office into his personal playground.Dwight makes his own grab for power when he leads a team to Florida to work under Nellie Bertram (Catherine Tate, Dr. Who), who may be slightly out of her mind. Jim and Pam’s relationship is put to the test when Pam goes on maternity leave and her replacement has eyes for Jim. Meanwhile, Erin harbors lingering feelings for Andy; Angela’s relationship deepens with her dashing (State) Senator; and Darryl looks for love in the warehouse.

Developed for American Television by Primetime Emmy® Award-winner Greg Daniels (Parks and Recreation, The Simpsons), watch all 24 episodes back-to-back in this five-disc set, with outstanding bonus features including extended episodes, deleted scenes, webisodes and more!
Bonus Content:
Disc 1 – The Office Season Eight:

  • Deleted Scenes

Disc 2 – The Office Season Eight:

  • Deleted Scenes

Disc 3 – The Office Season Eight:

  • Deleted Scenes

Disc 4 – The Office Season Eight:

  • Deleted Scenes

Disc 5 – The Office Season Eight:

  • Deleted Scenes
  • Blooper Reel
  • Webisodes
  • Super Bowl Promos

This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

Price: $299.00 - $255.46
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:25:56 UTC – Details)


1.SYLVOX 24-inch DC flat-screen TV, built-in DVD player, with a base, and high-resolution digital noise, suitable for RVs travel and home use.
2 .10.5V~28V full range wide voltage protection, which can effectively deal with the influence of unstable power supply voltage in the car on the TV when the RV starts and stops. Support DC voltage 12v/24v power supply, or use the attached adapter to connect to a home AC voltage 110v power supply.
With anti-reverse connection technology, when the positive and negative poles of the DC power supply are reversed, the TV will not be short-circuited, which effectively protects the TV.
3.Built-in dual 5W speaker cabinet , to provide high-quality sound. The square base bracket is earthquake-resistant . Designed for light motorhomes, caravans, motorhomes, boats, bedrooms, kitchens and home use
4 .HDMI and USB port for connection to USB or hard drive for recording and playback program file, or through the HDMI connection VAST box or media player. With a built-in DVD player, you can watch your favorite movies.
5. One-key scanning: Sylvox RV TV can be easily used in mobile environments such as boats and RVs . A simple function- SCAN is added to the remote control . When moving to a new location, just press the “Scan” button, and the TV will pass and retune to the new location and get all the channels in the new area.

We include a 100-240V adapter and a 12V cigarette lighter, so you can power it directly from a 12V socket, or you can power it throgh the adapter in the bedroom, kitchen.
The square base bracket has good shock resistance and can withstand bumps, potholes, and uneven roads.

Specification:
Resolution: 1920 x 1080 HD
Tuner: ATSC
Connection method: USB HDMI VGA
Voltage range: 10.5-28V DC
Aspect ratio: 16:9
Brightness: 220 cd/m2
Wall mount VESA : 100 x 100mm
Product size: 548.78*48.60*366.26mm
Standard: ATSC
Refresh rate: 60Hz
Power: 34w
Viewing angle: 178°H/178°V
Weight: 3.2Kg
Ports: EARPHONE, DC, HDMI, VGA, PC AUDIO, AV, YPBPR, AUDIO OUT, TV, COAX, USB
Accessories: remote control (including battery), power cable, adapter, square base, screws, manual, cigarette lighter.
DVD player supports DVD/VCD/CD discs, does not support playing Blu-ray discs.
Multiple Protection Design : Full HD TV support DC 12v/24v (DC wide voltage 10.5V-28V ) power supply, recoil protection (when the voltage changes sharply, it can become flat and will not damage the circuit), reverse connection protection (No short circuit even if the positive and negative terminals are reversed)
Excellent experience: 12 volt TV Built-in DVD, integrated ASTC tuner, with USB, HDMI, VGA port, cabinet speaker, minimal sound staining, reduced distortion, excellent broadband sound effect. 178°H/178°V ultra-wide viewing angle experience. With square bracket base, cigarette lighter, adapter and other accessories.
Use place: Travel and home Both, suitable for traveling campers with, trailers, RVs and home bedrooms, kitchens, lounges and other places of the perfect TV, through the included adapter to convert the home AC power to DC power to power the TV, thereby achieve home use effect.
Anti-seismic design, passed the 4G vibration test.6 pin DC port Anti-drop design, the plug is not easy to fall in the process of vibration.
High-definition TV: Resolution 1920 x 1080 Full HD picture quality, full high definition LCD TV, ELED backlight, slim and light weight body. High-performance 16 : 9 aspect ratio LCD panel, 8bit color panel with 16.7 million colors.
DVD player supports DVD/VCD/CD discs, does not support playing Blu-ray discs.

SYLVOX

SYLVOX is the brand of an American company that provides quality products and services to tens of millions of users worldwide.

A brand new installation of the Microsoft Windows 10 Pro 64 Bit Multi-Language English/French/Spanish Operating System, free of bloatware commonly installed from other manufacturers. As Microsoft’s stablest OS to date, Windows 10 Pro will maximize the utility of your PC for years to come.

DDR3 high-performance memory

Create a full featured and smoother experience with powerful processors, Oversized 16G DDR3 memory with Strictly selected particles.

2T hard disk drive

The OptiPlex 9010 comes with a 2T HDD so that you can store more photos, music and movies.

Gigabit Ethernet & USB Wi-Fi adapter

The OptiPlex 9010 connects to the Internet using a high speed Gigabit Ethernet adapter or stable performance Wi-Fi.

POWERFUL PROCESSOR – Your computer will be built with Intel’s top of the line Core i5 series processor so you can expect lightning fast, reliable and consistent performance and an exceptional PC experience.
SUPERIOR STORAGE AND MEMORY – Packed with ample solid state and hard drive space so you can store apps, games, photos, music and movies. Loaded with plenty of DDR3 RAM to help you zip through your tasks in a hurry and outperform the competition in any situation.
WINDOWS 10 LATEST RELEASE – We have added a brand new, fresh installation of Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit. It includes the new Microsoft Certificate of Authenticity (COA) and the Product Key.
MULTITASKING – You won’t have any issues with your regular day-to-day browsing with the featured 8GB DDR3 memory suited for multitasking power.
RENEWED – We follow strict requirements established for the MAR program by Microsoft. These requirements are designed to ensure that you receive a high quality and professionally refurbished computer.

Conscious design

Advanced performance and productivity

Available with Intel Core i5 processors, Intel HD graphics, and Intel vPro systems management, The OptiPlex 9010 enables increased power and productivity. Enjoy your bulk storage device!

Large internal space

Dual “3.5” internal drive bays supporting multiple hard disk drives capable of RAID configurations. This PC comes with 2T HDD so that you can store more.

Specifications

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570 3.4 GHz Turbo 3.8 GHz
  • Memory: 16GB DDR3
  • Storage: 2T HDD
  • Optical driver: DVD
  • Port: USB 3.0, DisplayPort, VGA, RJ-45.

Easy integration

Help get the most out of existing IT investments with legacy feature support available on the The OptiPlex 9010 like DP ports, a VGA port, a DP to HDMI adapter and an RJ-45 connection.Support Multi Monitor connection.

Powerful processing and drive options

Select from powerful 3nd Gen Intel Core i5-3570 3.4 GHz up to 3.8 GHz and integrated Intel HD UMA graphics along with other configurable options that let businesses configure the right OptiPlex 9010 for each user’s needs.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $899.99 - $819.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:49:37 UTC – Details)


The product is multiple voltage compatible, that voltage arrange is 100-240V
The IdeaCentre AIO 3i runs seamlessly, no matter the task or workload. The 10th generation Intel Core i5 processor, 16GB DDR4 memory, 1 TB of disk space, and a 256GB solid-state drive enable it to zip through everything
The FHD display on this all-in-one computer delivers exceptional, almost borderless viewing, even from wide angles. Just 9.5 mm at their thinnest, the narrow bezels deliver a huge 90% screen-to-body ratio
With its elegant stand and base, this AIO will save much-needed desk space in your home office. Tilt the stand to the perfect viewing angle, and hide away messy cables in the convenient built-in cable collector for less clutter and more space
Because your personal privacy matters, the webcam is fitted with a TrueBlock Privacy Shutter — just flick the button on the tip of your screen to close it
This all-in-one desktop has plenty of ports for your mouse, keyboard, and other peripherals — in addition to USB 2.0 and 3.0 ports, it has a 3-in-1 card reader and HDMI-out

Space-saving and jaw-dropping

Whether you need to work, watch something, or make a video call, simply turn to the eye-catching IdeaCentre AIO 3i. With its stylish stand and base, this 24 inch All In One will save you essential desk space—and look great in any room, too.

Performs like a dream

Even with heavy workloads, this All In One computer runs seamlessly. Thanks to 10th Gen Intel Core processors and a solid-state drive, it zips through everything.

Great for family viewing

Thanks to the 24” FHD IPS display and its narrow bezels, an exceptional viewing experience awaits. Able to be viewed from wide angles, the IdeaCentre AIO 3i is ideal for when watching or sharing something with your loved ones.

Built-in privacy

Your personal privacy matters. That’s why each IdeaCentre AIO 3i is fitted with a TrueBlock Privacy Shutter. When you’re finished with your webcam and wish to close it, just flick the button on the top of your screen.

And built-in flexibility

Whether you’re working or unwinding, you can tilt the stand on your IdeaCentre AIO 3i to the perfect angle. You can also easily adjust the screen, ideal for avoiding any annoying light reflection.

Here’s to being clutter free

Connecting portable drives and other devices to your PC can make for a messy desk. Not so with the IdeaCentre AIO 3i. It has a cable collector built into the stand, giving you more desk space to work and play with.

And being better connected

The IdeaCentre AIO 3i comes with plenty of ports for your other computing essentials, such as a soundbar or keyboard. In addition to USB 2.0 and 3.2 ports, it has a 3-in-1 card reader and an HDMI slot should you need a second monitor.

4.5
Price: $899.99 - $819.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:49:37 UTC – Details)

Our Customers asked and Free Signal TV has delivered! The next generation of mobile 12V DC powered high-definition televisions have arrived, featuring built-in Smart TV features that campers, boaters and tailgaters have been asking for! The Transit Platinum 12 Volt TV line offers 22”, 28”, 32” and 40” high-definition 1080p LED screen sizes with built in Wifi/Internet connectivity and other cutting-edge features like ultra-low power draw, integrated SD-DVD player, easy Bluetooth connectivity, popular apps like Netflix, Amazon Prime, YouTube and many more. Engineered for long lasting mobile use with vibration resistant chassis and durable 1080p high resolution LED screen. Standard home use televisions don’t last in a mobile environment – and the Transit Platinum models feature unique “Flex-Environment” engineering which allows reliable operation across a wide range of temperatures and humidities for reliable use in demanding environments. Manufactured to Free Signal TV’s rigid quality control standards and backed by a one-year free replacement warranty – an industry first that debuted with the original Transit 12 DC powered TV line. Easy set up and operation, includes 110V optional powerbrick, 12V car charger outlet cord, multi-function “one-key command” remote, and detailed user manual. Supported by Free Signal TV’s top-rated domestic-based Customer Care and Tech Support Teams for assistance with questions and customized set-up applications. Experience the enjoyment, performance and peace of mind that only Free Signal TV’s unique Advanced Entertainment Solutions can deliver!
Built in Wifi/Internet Access, Bluetooth Connectivity, Integrated SD – DVD Player.
Preloaded Popular Apps (Netflix, Amazon Prime, YouTube, Pandora & More).
Rugged Vibration Resistant Chassis for Trouble-Free Mobile/Off Road Use.
High-Definition Screen Sizes from 22” to 40”. “Flex-Environment” Engineering – Temperature and Humidity Adaptable.
